params._beneficiary: The receiver of the AMPH rewards
params._crvTotalRewards: The max CVR amount to exchange from the sender
params._cvxTotalRewards: The max CVX amount to exchange from the sender
params._vaultId: The vault id that is claiming

returns._claimedAmph: The amount of AMPH received by the beneficiary
returns._crvAmountToSend: The amount of CRV that the treasury got
returns._cvxAmountToSend: The amount of CVX that the treasury got

params._crvTotalRewards: The max CVR amount to exchange from the sender
params._cvxTotalRewards: The max CVX amount to exchange from the sender
params._sender: The address of the account claiming
params._vaultId: The vault id that is claiming

returns._claimableAmph: The amount of AMPH that would be received by the beneficiary
returns._crvAmountToSend: The amount of CRV the user will have to send
returns._cvxAmountToSend: The amount of CVX the user will have to send

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

changeCrvRewardFee(uint256).notice: Used by governance to change the fee taken from the CRV reward

changeCvxRewardFee(uint256).notice: Used by governance to change the fee taken from the CVX reward

changeVaultController(address).notice: Used by governance to change the vault controller

claimAmph(uint96,uint256,uint256,address.notice: Claims an amount of AMPH given a CVX and CRV quantity

claimable(address,uint96,uint256,uint256.notice: Returns the claimable amount of AMPH given a CVX and CRV quantity

recoverDust(address,uint256).notice: Used by governance to recover tokens from the contract
